评论详情: I was surprised how soft and comfortable this soft is.
It's basically see through like the quality is so bad

Shirt is oversized so has that I’m not trying to look cool vibe, and I’m quirky vibe. Like the logo and graphics which aren’t peeling or fading. Pair with some high waiter jean shorts and canvas doc boots for a relaxed summer fit!

The material is not full cotton, but it is good quality and very thick. The graphics is not as vivid as shown online, and the peppers shown are orange as opposed to red. I was disappointed in that because I wanted a red shirt to match a red pair of shoes I owned. The shirt is also shorter than expected and is a cropped style T-shirt that falls at my waist and the neck is a close and tight fit and comes up to the base of the neck.
